pages.title: any title
pages.text: Yutong Tian (Student Member, IEEE) received the B.S. degree in electronic information engineering from Southwest University, Chongqing, China, in 2021. He is currently pursuing the Ph.D. degree in electronic science and technology with the University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC), Chengdu, China.He was admitted to the China Association for Science and Technology Young Talent Support Project Doctoral Special Program in 2024. He was with the College of Sciences and Engineering, University of Tasmania, Hobart, TAS, Australia, as a Visiting Student, in 2018. His research interests include radar signal processing, digital beamforming, wireless communication, machine olfaction and machine learning. 教育背景 电子科技大学博士研究生, 电子科学与技术 (电路与系统), 2023年-至今导师：黎湧 教授 电子科技大学 硕士研究生, 电子科学与技术 (电路与系统), 2021年-2023年导师：李廷军 副教授 西南大学工学学士, 电子信息工程, 2017年-2021年导师：闫嘉 教授 研究方向 无线电导航、雷达、通信相关基带信号处理； 数字相控阵信号处理（方向图综合、波形设计）； 高速磁浮与铁路无线通信； 电子鼻系统及其信号处理； 机器学习与模式识别； 优化理论 技术技能 熟练使用MATLAB实现算法实现与数据处理； 熟练使用Verilog，基于Vivado平台进行FPGA开发； 熟练使用C/C++进行单片机等微控制器开发（包括STM32, ESP32, Arduino等） 熟练使用Python进行机器学习模型开发； 熟练使用Altium Designer进行单板电路设计 联系方式 E-mail: yttian2021@std.uestc.edu.cn Education Background University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China Doctor degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2023-Now Supervisor: Prof. Yong Li University of Electronic Science and Techonology of China Master degree candidate, Electronic science and technology (Circuit and System), 2021-2023 Supervisor: Associate Prof. Tingjun Li Southwest University Bychelor of engineering, Electronic information engeering, 2017-2021 Supervisor: Associate Prof. Jia Yan Research Interests Wireless radio navigation and radar-related baseband signal processing, Digital Phased Array Signal Processing, Pattern Synthesis, and Waveform Design, High speed Maglev and railway wireless communication, Electronic nose system, Machine learning and Pattern recognization, Optimization theory. Techniques & Skills MATLAB for Algorithm Simulation, statistic processing. Verilog for FPGA Programming and Implementation in Vivado Platform C/C++ for Microprocessors Development (STM32, ESP32, Arduino, etc.) Python for Machine Learning Models Implementations Altium Designer for Circuit Design in System Level Contact me E-mail: yttian2021@std.uestc.edu.cn Last updated on Mar 28, 2024.

posts.text: 😊Welcome friend! If you want to know more about me, please click the tag above for more details!Personal News!2024[2024/07/21] ✈I have come back to Chengdu. [2024/07/19] ⚜️ I have made a report today in 2024 IEEE AP-S! [2024/07/17] ⚜️ I have made a report today in 2024 IEEE AP-S! [2024/07/12] ✈We are in group to attend the 2024 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation and USNC-URSI Radio Science Meeting (USNC-URSI), Florance, Italy. [2024/05/01] 🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 article named “Matrix-Pencil-Based Waterflow Velocity Detection Method by 24 GHz Millimetre-Wave Radar” in IEEE Antennas and Propagation Letters! [2024/04/07] 🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 conference articles in 2024 International Conference on Microwave and Millimeter Wave Technology (ICMMT2024), Beijing, China! [2024/03/29] 🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 2 conference articles in 2024 IEEE International Symposium on Antennas and Propagation and USNC-URSI Radio Science Meeting (USNC-URSI), Florance, Italy! [2024/03/27] 🎇Congratulations on the win of the Academic Up-and-Coming Star Prize Scholarship of UESTC (2024), values RMB 3000! [2024/03/25] :triangular_flag_on_post: An article named “Matrix-Pencil-Based Waterflow Velocity Detection Method by 24 GHz Millimetre-Wave Radar” has been revised and resubmitted to IEEE Antennas and Propagation Letters. [2024/03/24] ✈I have come back to Chengdu for normal work and life. [2024/03/06] 🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 article named “A Nonlinear Manifold Embedding Extreme Learning Machine to Improve Gas Recognition of Electronic Nose” in IEEE Sensors Journal! [2024/03/01] 🎇Congratulations on the Acceptance of 1 article named “Adaptive Gradient Projection Correction Method for Resistivity Array Imaging Logging” in IEEE Sensors Journal!
